message.content: {"id": "23787", "title": "Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields", "description": "Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. The current implementation on all motif platforms looks bad.", "OB": "The fields on the Info page are created as readonly Text fields instead of Labels. It seems that their values can be selected and copied by the user.", "EB": "The fields on the Info page should be implemented as Labels instead of readonly Text fields. This will improve the visual appearance of the page on all motif platforms.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue, select a Project, right click and go to Properties. On the subsequent Info page, observe the readonly fields (the values for Path, Type, etc.). They are displayed as text fields instead of labels."}

origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '23787', 'title': 'Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties  Info page should not use text fields', 'description': 'Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'are created as readonly Text fields instead of Labels.I guess this isso that their values can be selected and copied by the user (?) ', 'SR': 'select a Project, rightclickProperties on the subsequent Info page the readonly fields (the values for Path, Type,etc.) '}
